headline.print_headline: Rise Is Seen In Students Who Use E-Cigarettes
headline.main: Rise Is Seen in Students Who Use E-Cigarettes

docs.abstract: Survey by Centers for Disease Control and Prevention shows surge in popularity of e-cigarettes among middle and high school students, prompting concerns that the devices could be creating new health problems.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: The increased popularity of e-cigarettes among middle and high school students is prompting concerns that the devices could be creating new health problems.
docs.snippet: The increased popularity of e-cigarettes among middle and high school students is prompting concerns that the devices could be creating new health problems.
